location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP NO.2: SOUTHERN FRONTIER OF TURKEY IN ASIA'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper with manuscript additions in coloured inkDimensions: 310x 733mm, on sheet 505 x 759mm

mods.abstract: This map shows Turkey where it is included in Asia and indicates the boundaries between Turkey, Syria, Mesopotamia and the Old Frontier. The map also indicates relief with contours.The map includes a printing statement which reads '(B 16479) WT 18378-212.5050.10/20.H&S,LTD.'
